column4: How do I run a shell script? I've downloaded the file veetle-0.9.6-linux-install.sh that I want to run. I try by typing "sudo ./veetle-0.9.6-linux-install.sh" and it sais "sudo: ./veetle-0.9.6-linux-install.sh: command not found"
I have navigated to the folder.
It worked when I typed sudo sh, thanks!
